attributes.action: To keep the Arts Department going at Hammersmith,Ealing and West London College.
attributes.additional_details: - We have been informed our course will come to a duration by the end of this week so, we have limited time to fix the solution. Even so, the college are still advertising the course in prospectus's and online on there website. Therefore, we are seeking any help possible to keep the course running such as press, media, solicitors, mps and etc.
attributes.background: About 20-30 students are now being forced out of there further education as their course in the arts department has been terminated.Therefore without reason having to find other forms of training 5 weeks into there original courses applied for. This issue is about my course and my fellow classmates.

rejection.details: This isn't an issue on which the UK Government or Parliament could take action.
